title: How do I book an appointment with your salon?
desc: You can book an appointment through our mobile app.

title: Do I need to make a deposit when booking an appointment?
desc: No, we do not require a deposit to book an appointment. However, we do require a credit card on file to hold the appointment.

title: What should I do if I need to cancel or reschedule my appointment?
desc: You can cancel or reschedule your appointment through our mobile app.

title: What services do you offer?
desc: We offer hair cutting, coloring, styling, and more. You can view our full list of services on our mobile app.
